General.Name: SL Corp
General.Description: SL Corporation manufactures and sells automotive parts in South Korea and internationally. It offers lamp system products, such as head lamps, fog lamps, rear lamps, and center high mounted stop lamp (CHMSLs); chassis system products, including auto and manual shifters, park brake levers, pedals, carrier spare tires, fuel filler caps, and tie rod ends; mirror system products, such as outside and inside mirrors; and front-end module parts, such as cooling products, horns, bumper beams, hood-latches, and sensors, as well as around view monitoring products and head up displays. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Gyeongsan, South Korea.
